Dalenberg says despite its name it will be more of restaurant than a pub. They will feature steaks, corned beef sandwiches (“We make our own corned beef,” he says), smoked whitefish chowder, a variety of salads, in-house sauerkraut, East North Carolina-style barbecue, Texas-style brisket, jambalaya, oysters Rockefeller, shrimp from the Gulf of Mexico and Thai coconut curry. Dalenberg assures that Grand River Brewery will also have vegan and gluten-free food. They will also have a large and varied seafood menu, featuring Lake Superior walleye, perch, lake trout, whitefish flown in from the Faroe Islands (located between Norway and Iceland in the Atlantic Ocean) and shrimp from the Gulf of Mexico. Michigan committed a season-high 22 turnovers. Fifth-year Olivier Nkamhoua recorded eight, while Dug McDaniel had five.
